text: Tarun Ghosh is a Bangladeshi art director and animation editor. He won Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Art Direction for the film Kittonkhola (2000). ==Selected films== ===Animation editor=== * Nirontor - 2006 ===Art director=== * Kittonkhola - 2000 * Naroshundor - 2009 ==Awards and nominations== National Film Awards {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" ! Year !! Award !! Category !! Film !! title: Tarun Ghosh
